document_data.name: Greyanna Dhuurniv
document_data.mainbody: '''Greyanna Dhuurniv''' was the middle Matron Sister of [[House Dhuurniv]] involved in the [[Zhent]] invasion of [[Shadowdale]] in the [[1375 DR|Year of Risen Elfkin, 1375 DR]].
document_data.History: Although Greyanna and her sisters allied with the [[Zhentarim]], the Matron Sisters had plots in minds different from the objective of the [[Zhentilar]] and the [[Shar]]rans. Greyanna was always fascinated with the [[Twisted Tower of Ashaba]] and wanted to discover all its secrets. She also finally found and awoke the lost marshal, [[Azmaer Dhuurniv]].
